EXTENDED: **{{prefix}}divorce** ~ Divorces your current spouse if you have one. If the marriage was accepted, then there will be a penalty to divorce.
ALIASES: Divorce does not have any aliases.
NOT_MARRIED: {{mention}}, I can not divorce you if you are not already married. Use the **profile** command to see the details of your marriage.
DIVORCED: {{mention}}, you are now divorced. You are once again in the sad and lonely single life.
